H0.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1575

H1.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1605

H2.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1580

H3.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1547-1616

A4.text: In 1575, he was captured by Barbary pirates; after five years in captivity, he was ransomed, and returned to Madrid.

A5.text: Part One of Don Quixote was published in 1605, and Part Two in 1615.

A6.text: Miguel de Cervantes was born in 1547 and died in 1616.
